caption.center: J. H. JENNINGS et al., Appellants, v. G. W. LAWRENCE, Appellee.

opinion.attorneys:
Cecil Sanders, Lancaster, James F. Clay, Danville, for appellants.
Edward P. Roark, Delbert Eagle, Lancaster, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Motion for an appeal from a judgment of the Garrard Circuit Court for $1,430. Honorable K. S. Alcorn, Judge.
We consider this appeal under KRS 21.080. The evidence fully sustains the verdict and there is no error apparent in the record.
The motion for an appeal is overruled and the judgment stands affirmed.Page 118
